name: LifeLine - Ludum Dare 46
description:
LifeLine  - Music Pattern Obstacle Dodge

You are the joyful guardian of 'The Great Song'
Collect Notes and avoid Spikes to 'Keep it Alive'

Menu
    Arrow keys to select button
    Space to hit button

Game
    Space to Jump

How to play
    Collect Blue Notes
    Avoid Red Spikes
    Green Spikes Speeds up the ground

My first game jam game for Ludum Dare 46 

Enjoy the randomly generated menu music.

Please comment your scores!
